The people under minority aggression are Sinhalese.!!! In Digana, a Sinhalese man was killed by Muslims for breaking the mirror of their trishaw.!!! As far as  the people know,  since this government came into power, the minorities have taken the upper hand.!!! Sinhalese people, Catholics massacred,  Buddhist Prelates and Temples, our Buddhist archeological places are destroyed by minorities, and claim such land as their worship places.!!!! We need leaders like in some other countries protecting the majority, but in this country, only minority is protected to get their votes.!!! 
Recently the Muslim politicians had a press conference and accused the Muslims are harassed, beaten and intimidated in this country, which are blatant lies.!!! The Muslim extremists were trained, nurtured and were given  a license to kill innocent innocent people, though not a single Muslim was killed.!!! But the trust was broken by scarcely, suspicious people in the country.!!
Some people against these aggression want to speak on what has happened/is happening behind our backs,  and they are not extremists, they haven't killed anyone.!!! Therefore punishing those people are against the constitution,  just because they speak the truth, which is called the FREEDOM OF SPEECH.!!! Taking such people into custody is not correct to please politician or minorities, because the minorities can accuse the country,  make complaints at the UN on bogus war crimes, demand for self rule, but no one has been taken into custody for treason.!!! Isn't this double standard action???
Sir, as the Army Commander, you must act impartially and not according to certain politicians or their instruction to keep an eye on Sinhalese activities only  and not on other minorities, as there is plenty of incidences so far the minorities have been creating or provoking the rest of the people inside and outside this country.!!!
This country underwent a 30 year war fought by minority Tamil LTTE terrorists, and now by Muslim extremists, trying to impose their ideologies, by killing people of other religions and their ideologies and beliefs.!!! This is happening not only in Sri Lanka, but all around the world, where the Muslims are acting in treason, by stabbing, shooting, injuring and killing the majority of those countries, where they are provided refuge.!!!! 
According to the reporters, in most of those countries, the majorities are intimidated by minorities and as the leaders in Sri Lanka, leaders of those countries are very reluctant to take necessary action to put an end to these aggressions, because minority votes are valuable for those politicians and for their survival.!!
